title: Victoria Beckham ‘ditches YouTube channel as it only rakes in £25 a day’
text:
Victoria is going to focus on her business instead (Picture: KARIM JAAFAR/AFP/Getty Images)

Victoria Beckham has reportedly scrapped her YouTube channel as it only brought in £25 a day.

The high costs of producing the lifestyle videos allegedly led to five-figure losses for the fashion designer, so we’re not surprised she ceased production.

The 45-year-old tried to launch the channel as a destination for fashion fans earlier in the year and hoped to promote her fashion range as well as show ‘the real’ her.

However, the former Spice Girl only had around 109,000 subscribers which meant she reportedly struggled to make money from the channel.

Not only did Victoria struggle with the YouTube channel, her flagship store in Mayfair also hasn’t been doing well, leaving staff fearing for their jobs.

Investors pressured the designer to axe a third of her work force last year.

‘The YouTube channel has been impossible to monetise, and it was very time-consuming so the decision was that it would be pulled,’ a source close to Victoria told the Mail on Sunday.

Fashion icons (Picture: Gerrish/WireImage for White Company)

‘While Victoria enjoyed the filming and had lots of fun doing it, there were production costs that were not being covered by its income.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘The decision was made to concentrate everyone’s time and efforts on something that is going to benefit her business.’

In her last accounts, she posted an operating loss of £10.2 million in 2017, which was up from £8.2 million in 2016.

Last month, she launched an Andy Warhol exhibition at her shop, which Posh Spice thought would improve sales.

Recently, David and Victoria put on a loved up display as they celebrated Andy Warhol at Sotheby’s 275th anniversary.

The beauty mogul had been invited as the art dealer’s special guest, and took both her footballer beau and eldest son Brooklyn along with her.

Turning up to the bougie bash, the iconic family made sure to match, as they were all dressed in head-to-toe black – with David and his bambino both having a white t-shirt poking out from their jackets.

Metro.co.uk have contacted reps for comment.

description: Victoria Beckham is reportedly no longer creating content for her 109,000 subscribers as it wasn't bringing in enough money every day.
